summary: This is a mod wich adds a view new things to the playerhome of Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
Hey! This is my first real mod, enjoy it!

First of I just wanted to tell you that I am from Germany, but I'll do my best in writing english.

What the mod does?

- adds some new stuff infront of the house
- changes the whole interior of Breezehome
- adds a new NPC called 'Diener', wich is servant in english (he cant do anything yet, I hope I'll be able to fix his later)
- completely new areas like a tower or a basement are being added

IMPORTANT:

- I do not actually know what happens if you buy new furniture things for breezehome, you can try it but I wouldn't recommend it :D
- the mod may not be that porfessional but as already mentioned, it's my first one
author: itsCatz
